Top-3 Similar Questions: so_57384674: Problem with testing specific set of files
Top-3 Scripts:
so_57384674: #!/bin/bash
while read -r line; do
   dirname=$(dirname "$line")
   basename=$(basename "$line")
   if [[ -f "$dirname/1_$basename" &&  -f "$dirname/2_$basename" && -f "$dirname/3_$basename" ]]; then
      echo "3 thumbnails exists, you can remove $line!"
   fi   
done < <(find . -maxdepth 3 -type f -name "*.jpg" -not -name "[1-3]_*.jpg")
